7. eat-ate

10. feel-felt

15.keep-kept

abash=abashed=abashed=memalukan

related_questions.question:
1. If you want to make meatballs, where do you go to buy meat?    a. drugstore
b. fashions store
c. butcher
d. chemist
2. A person who sells flowers is a ....
a. gardener
b. farmer
c. florist
d. pianist
3. Mrs. Rudolf likes to make a research of ancient mummy in Egypt. She is ....
a. archeologist
b. carpenter
c. linguist
d. judge
4. A person who cheers the kids in a party and wears funny make up is called ....
a. librarian
b. cop
c. nurse
d. clown
5. Mr. Davidson carves the wood to make a mask. He makes earn living from carving. He is ....
a. sculptor
b. bricklayer
c. farmer
d. barber

answers.answer:
1. c. butcher
2. c. florist
3. a. archeologist
4. d. clown
5. a. sculptor
Menurut saya itu :)

polisi adalah orang yang berjasa dalam menjaga keamanan. tidak siang,pagi,sore atau malam ia siap untuk berjaga. polisi tidak berbeda jauh dengan satpam. polisi juga patut kita hargai dan hormati atas jasanya ,karena tanpa Ada kata polisi mungkin keamanan kita akan kacau
polisi ialah seseorang yg suka memajak kita jika kita melanggar.dan mereka sering korupsi

answers.answer:
Description of horse

Horse is one of mamalia. Horse have a four legs. Horse have a even tooth. Horse has long tail. Horse have unique characteristic is horse can’t see so if a cabman riding horse, the horse must wear a glasses so that the horse can walk smooth. The horse eat grass. The horse have a brown skin,  and the horse have little hair in head. That’s all about my description about horse.   Description of horse Horse is one of mamalia. Horse have a four legs. Horse have a even tooth. Horse has long tail. Horse have unique characteristic is horse can’t see so if a cabman riding horse, the horse must wear a glasses so that the horse can walk smooth. The horse eat grass. The horse have a brown skin,  and the horse have little hair in head.

That’s all about my description about horse.
A horse is a gentle,loving and loyal animal. The animal is a mammal. Horses can have many different coats than other. They have : hooves,and tail. not all horses gentle.  Many are not at gentle.

related_questions.question: Apakah Rumus Lengkap Past Perfect Tense?

answers.answer:
Rumus Past Perfect Tense
Positif: S + had + V3
Negatif: S + had + not + V3
Tanya: Had + S + V3

(+) S + had + Verb-3/past participle
(-) S + had + not + Verb-3/past participle
(?) had + S + Verb-3/past participle
